languages.text: "То есть вы притащили сюда осколок Осколка К'тан? Восхитительно, Вольный Торговец".
"So you have brought a shard of the C'tan Shard here? You amaze me, Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "То есть вы притащили сюда осколок Осколка К'тан? Восхитительно, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: "So you have brought a shard of the Shard of C'Tan here? Amazing, Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "So you have brought a shard of the Shard of C'Tan here? Amazing, Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'Tan's Shard here, haven't you? Marvellous job, Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'Tan's Shard here, haven't you? Marvellous job, Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'tan Shard here? You amaze me, Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'tan Shard here? You amaze me, Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Vous avez apporté un fragment de l'Écharde C'tan ici, n'est-ce pas ? Je suis très impressionnée, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'tan Shard here? You amaze me, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez apporté un fragment de l'Écharde C'tan ici, n'est-ce pas ? Excellent travail, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «De modo que ha traído un fragmento del fragmento de C'tan hasta aquí... Impresionante, Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'tan Shard here? You amaze me, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «De modo que ha traído un fragmento del fragmento de C'Tan hasta aquí... Un trabajo excelente, Comerciante Independiente».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “也就是说，你把星神碎片的其中一块碎片带了过来，是吗？你让我大吃一惊，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'tan Shard here? You amaze me, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，你把星神碎片的其中一块碎片带了过来，是吗？真是了不起，行商浪人。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Ihr habt also ein Stück des C'tan-Fragments hergebracht? Ihr erstaunt mich, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'tan Shard here? You amaze me, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt also ein Fragment des C'tan-Fragments hergebracht, ja? Erstklassige Arbeit, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「だから、お前はク＝タン・シャードの欠片をここに持ってきたというわけか？驚かされたよ、自由開拓者」
languages.original_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'tan Shard here? You amaze me, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「だから、お前はク＝タン・シャードの欠片をここに持ってきたというわけか？驚かされたよ、自由開拓者」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "C'tan Parçası'nın bir kısmını buraya mı getirdin? Sana hayret ediyorum Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'tan Shard here? You amaze me, Rogue Trader."
